Blacksmith Feynn: Ah, it's you! You want something from me, eh? Ha ha! Skill has its price, you know. But my time is too valuable to throw it away on trivial projects. Give-and-take, my friend! You aren't fresh off the turnip cart. You know that there's nothing free in this world. So...what do you have to offer me?
